entity.name: scanjob
entity.query: SELECT sj.id jobid, sj.status jobstatus, sj.modified scanjobmodified, coalesce(sj.reviserid, 0) reviserid, e.id entryid, scannable.stype stype, scannable.modified scannablemodified, scannable.signature signature, scannable.worktitle worktitle, scannable.workauthors workauthors, scannable.parttitle parttitle, scannable.partauthors partauthors, scannable.pageStart pagestart, scannable.pageEnd pageend, rc.id collectionid, rc.rcnumberid collectionnumber, rcl.name locationname, rcl.id locationid FROM scan_job sj LEFT JOIN (SELECT sjbc.bookchapterid AS scannableid, sjbc.scanjobid AS scanjobid FROM scan_job_book_chapter sjbc UNION SELECT sjja.journalarticleid AS scannableid, sjja.scanjobid AS scanjobid FROM scan_job_journal_article sjja) AS scannable_job ON sj.id = scannable_job.scanjobid LEFT JOIN (SELECT ja.id AS id, 'JournalArticle' AS stype, ja.signature AS signature, ja.journaltitle AS worktitle, '' AS workauthors, ja.articletitle AS parttitle, ja.authors AS partauthors, ja.pageStart AS pagestart, ja.pageEnd AS pageend, ja.modified AS modified FROM journal_article ja UNION SELECT bc.id AS id, 'BookChapter' AS stype, bc.signature AS signature, bc.booktitle AS worktitle, bc.bookauthors AS workauthors, bc.chaptertitle AS parttitle, bc.chapterauthors AS partauthors, bc.pageStart AS pagestart, bc.pageEnd AS pageend, bc.modified AS modified FROM book_chapter bc) AS scannable ON scannable_job.scannableid = scannable.id LEFT JOIN entry e ON scannable.id = e.id LEFT JOIN reserve_collection rc ON rc.id = e.reservecollectionid LEFT JOIN library_location rcl ON rc.librarylocationid = rcl.id WHERE e.deleted IS NULL

entity.name: docents
entity.query: select p.userid docentid from participation p left join role r on p.roleid = r.id WHERE p.enddate is null and r.name = 'Dozent' and p.reservecollectionid = ${scanjob.collectionid}

entity.name: authors
entity.query: select u.realname realname from users u where u.userid = ${docents.docentid}

entity.name: reviser
entity.query: SELECT u.realname realname FROM users u WHERE ${scanjob.reviserid} < 0 and u.userid = ${scanjob.reviserid}
